name: Car Rally By Aman Verma
description:
Wanna become the heavy driver of starting era of Game Development Just Try this classic Car Rally Game.

As in this game you have to dodge enemy cars and collect coins to make your score As you are playing enemy cars also speed up to beat you.

If you are a game developer then you can also modify this game and don't forget to mention me by my real name,and upload it your itch.io account.

if you like this game please support by subscribing to my channel.

My Youtube Channel Link:-https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx96AT0RKJnJTXR-G35hrGA
